name: Pecto (Gary1q2)
description:
Pecto is a cute little adventure puzzle platformer game developed for my year 12 Design and Technology HSC major project. (Made this back in 2015)

It follows the story of a young kid growing up to become a 'trader' and gets lost in the forest dungeons and is trying to find his way out back home. This game relies on players to solve puzzles using many mechanics that are introduced via level design and increases in difficulty as the game progresses.

Can you beat this game?

Cool features:
-Mechanics with progressively difficulty taught through level design (no tutorials)
-Propulsion gun can be used for many different applications
-Combat system and enemies
-Interesting storyline
-Typical playtime: 4 hours
